channel.description: CIS 527 Lab 1 - Ubuntu File Permissions Linux File Permissions Classes User - owner of the file Group - group assigned to file Others - other users Permissions Read - read file contents Write - change/delete file Execute - run program or script & list folder contents File List Image Credit: Digital Ocean File Modes Image Credit: Digital Ocean Octal Permissions Image Credit: Just Enough Linux Common Octal Values Image Credit: Linode
